body: i'm thankful for wayne shorter's recording of "[ponta de areia](https://open.spotify.com/track/2SU21YLdwyTnqJpS7Jc3lD?si=BzJOTJvRR8yWuU-2XxLycw)," which begins with a joyful falsetto parade and then segues into a soft ballad middle section, sax liquid and drinkable through a straw, before kicking back into the jam at the end, the color saturation all the way up.
